channel.title: Need some help please!
channel.description:
Ok I'm using PwnScapes source and I have skills not working, and I was wondering how do I make simple methods for skills that gain fast XP for Herblore, Runecrating, Fletching, Smithing, Mining, Fishing, and Farming, I need to know how to write the code/method for it, I'm MEGA confused :s
Also whenever you buy a Fire cape and if you log out it dissappears and I need to know how to fix that :s
Add me on my MSN at: pure69m0nk@hotmail.com
Thanks! -Nate
